roleset.name: standing
roleset.note: UPRIGHT-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. (from upright.01-j)

example.text: When the doll was upright, head-feet was faster than front-back

roleset.name: morally good

role.descr: specific domain/aspect of arg1 that is upstanding

example.text: Job was upright in heart, a right spirit was renewed in him;
